sentences.en: Chlorine is a kind of high effective and widely used germicide.
sentences.cn: 氯是一种高效的杀菌剂，用途十分广泛。

sentences.en: Chloroxylenol , a halogenated phenol, is a germicide that is effective against gram negative and gram positive bacteria, fungi, and yeast.
sentences.cn: 一个卤代酚，是一种有效的杀菌剂是对革兰氏阴性菌和革兰氏阳性菌，真菌和酵母。

sentences.en: Ratified use of product: the 5 th classification as Germicide , Hygiene Disinfectant, Disinfectant.
sentences.cn: 核定使用商品(第5类)杀菌剂(真菌); 卫生消毒剂; 消毒剂(商品截止 )

sentences.en: The present invention discloses one kind of germicide composition containing pyraclostrobin and mancozeb and its application.
sentences.cn: 本发明公开了一种含唑菌胺酯和代森锰锌的杀菌组合物及其应用.

sentences.en: The present invention discloses one kind of germicide composition containing trichlamide and thiophanate - methyl and its application.
sentences.cn: 本发明公开了一种含水杨菌胺与甲基硫菌灵的杀菌组合物及其应用.

sentences.en: Then, the whole spectacle gets even worse when you have to knead germicide into the contents.
sentences.cn: 然后更糟糕的事是你必须自己动手把杀菌剂均匀的揉进那些东西中。

sentences.en: Using biological means or exploiting biological germicides instead of chemical germicide were considered to settle these problems.
sentences.cn: 克服这一问题的重要途径之一就是采用生物防治，开发生物杀菌剂。

sentences.en: YOULUJIN ( sodium Dichloroisocyanurate ) is a kind of high effective and widely used germicide and disinfectant.
sentences.cn: 优氯净 ( 二氯异氰尿酸钠 ) 是一种广谱高效的杀菌、消毒剂,用途十分广泛.

trans.tran_en: any substance that kills germs or other microorganisms
